item.title: YouTube rolls out Studio updates, ‘likeness’ detection, lip synced dubs, creator collabs and more
item.description: YouTube launches a handful of updates for creators, including lip syncing features for dubbed videos, likeness detection, collabs, an AI chatbot and m...

item.title: YouTube Live gets a major update, introduces dual-format streaming, minigames, and more
item.description: YouTube announced new features for livestreaming, such as letting creators play mini-games, AI-powered highlights, and more.

item.title: YouTube to use AI to help podcasters promote themselves with clips and Shorts
item.description: YouTube teases new AI-powered tools for turning podcasts into video clips, even if they're audio-only.

item.title: YouTube announces new generative AI tools for Shorts creators
item.description: YouTube is bringing a custom version of Google's text-to-video generative AI model, Veo 3, to Shorts, along with a new remixing tool, an 'Edit with AI...

item.title: YouTube Music launches new tools for artists to reward fans with exclusive merch and videos
item.description: YouTube Music users will soon be able to pre-save songs, see a countdown for album releases, get exclusive merch, and more.
